recipesJson.name: Límónique
recipesJson.author: SixStrings952
recipesJson.description:
The 7 DAY STEEP required will result in  a vape with light fluffy angel food cake, topped with a sweet lemon-cream cheese icing. (Warning: vaping earlier than 7 days will be slightly 'Pledgey'!) 

**No subs.**
  
Recommended VG-70%

#EJUICEMAKERS
  
Please don't use my recipe for commercial gain nor post to other sites. Thank you & enjoy!
